testcase.name: search for hotel
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the home page..........................................skipped When the user enters location "Chicago, IL, United States" and selects rewards program "Amazon.com Gift Card".skipped And the user selects start date "05/01/2019" and end date "05/29/2019"......skipped And the user selects number of guests "1 Guest" and number of rooms "1 Room".skipped And the user clicks search..................................................skipped Then the user should see results "accept" for "Chicago, IL, United States" and "Amazon.com Gift Card".skipped
